emailTemplate.subject: Login from a new location
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

We noticed a login to your {APP_NAME} account from a new location:

{ALERT_INFO}

If this wasn't you, you should immediately change your {APP_NAME} account password to revoke access from all other locations.

If this was you, you may disregard this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

emailTemplate.subject: OTP for {APP_NAME}
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

Your one-time password is: {OTP}

If you didn't ask for the one-time password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

verificationTemplate.subject: Verify your {APP_NAME} email
verificationTemplate.body:
Hello,

Thank you for joining us at {APP_NAME}.

Click on the button below to verify your email address.

Verify

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Reset your {APP_NAME} password
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to reset your password.

Reset password

If you didn't ask to reset your password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Confirm your {APP_NAME} new email address
confirmEmailChangeTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm new email

If you didn't ask to change your email address, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

emailTemplate.subject: Login from a new location @ {APP_NAME}
emailTemplate.body:
{APP_NAME}

New Login Detected

We noticed a new login to your {APP_NAME} account.

Login Details:

{ALERT_INFO}

If this was not you, please immediately change your {APP_NAME} password to revoke access from all other locations.

If this was you, you may disregard this email.

© {APP_NAME}. All rights reserved.

emailTemplate.subject: OTP for {APP_NAME}
emailTemplate.body:
{APP_NAME}

Verify your identity

Use the following one-time password (OTP) to complete your login.

{OTP}

If you didn't request this code, you can safely ignore this email.

© {APP_NAME}. All rights reserved.

verificationTemplate.subject: Verify your {APP_NAME} email
verificationTemplate.body:
{APP_NAME}

Verify your email

Welcome to {APP_NAME}. Please confirm your email address to active your account and get started.

CONFIRM EMAIL

Button not working? Paste this link into your browser:
{APP_URL}/_/#/auth/confirm-verification/{TOKEN}

© {APP_NAME}. All rights reserved.

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Reset your {APP_NAME} password
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
{APP_NAME}

Reset your password

Click the button below to reset the password for your {APP_NAME} account.

RESET PASSWORD

If you didn't ask to reset your password, you can ignore this email.

Button not working? Use this link:
{APP_URL}/_/#/auth/confirm-password-reset/{TOKEN}

© {APP_NAME}. All rights reserved.

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Confirm your {APP_NAME} new email address
confirmEmailChangeTemplate.body:
{APP_NAME}

Confirm email change

We received a request to change your email address for {APP_NAME}.

CONFIRM NEW EMAIL

If you didn't ask to change your email address, you can safely ignore this email.

Button not working? Use this link:
{APP_URL}/_/#/auth/confirm-email-change/{TOKEN}

© {APP_NAME}. All rights reserved.

name: _authOrigins
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_authOrigins_unique_pairs` ON `_authOrigins` (collectionRef, recordRef, fingerprint)

name: _externalAuths
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_record_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, recordRef, provider)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_collection_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, provider, providerId)

name: call_transcripts
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_call_transcripts_call ON call_transcripts (call)

name: outreach_logs
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_outreach_logs_event ON outreach_logs (event)
